scripts.docker: mkdir -p "$(pwd)/../workaround" && ROOT_DIR="$(pwd)/.." USER_ID=$(id -u ${USER}) GROUP_ID=$(id -g ${USER}) docker compose -f ../develop.yml run --tty --rm --service-ports --entrypoint /bin/ash client
scripts.docker:build: mkdir -p "$(pwd)/../workaround" && ROOT_DIR="$(pwd)/.." USER_ID=$(id -u ${USER}) GROUP_ID=$(id -g ${USER}) docker compose -f ../develop.yml run --rm client run build
scripts.docker:dev: mkdir -p "$(pwd)/../workaround" && ROOT_DIR="$(pwd)/.." USER_ID=$(id -u ${USER}) GROUP_ID=$(id -g ${USER}) docker compose -f ../develop.yml up --build client
